ARABIC: بَلْ عَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَقَالَ ٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا شَىْءٌ عَجِيبٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Nonetheless they are amazed that a warner should have come to them from among themselves and those who are kafir say, 'What an extraordinary thing!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They are rather surprised that a warner from among themselves has come to them. So the unbelievers say: "This is astonishing:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Nay; they wondered that a warner should have come to them from among themselves. The unbelievers said: “This indeed is a strange thing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In fact, it seems odd (to the pagans) that a warner from their own people has come to them. The disbelievers have said, "It is very strange
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Rather they were shocked that a Herald of Warning came to them from among themselves, so the disbelievers said, “This is something really strange.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nay, they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves. So the disbelievers say: "This is a strange thing!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay! they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, so the unbelievers say: This is a wonderful thing:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Nay, but they marvel that a warner has come to them from among them; and the unbelievers say, 'This is a marvellous thing!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, but they marvel that a warner of their own hath come unto them; and the disbelievers say: This is a strange thing:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Indeed, they are astonished that a warner should have come to them from among themselves. So these deniers of the truth say, "This is indeed a strange thing,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Aye! they marvel that there hath come Unto them a warner from among themselves; so the infidels Say: this is a thing wondrous!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed they consider it odd that a warner from among themselves should have come to them. So the faithless say, ‘This is an odd thing.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But they wonder that there has come to them a Warner from among themselves. So the Unbelievers say: "This is a wonderful thing!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nay, they wonder that there has come to them a warner (Muhammad SAW) from among themselves. So the disbelievers say: "This is a strange thing!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: No, but they marvel that from among themselves a warner has come to them. The unbelievers say (in mockery): 'This is a marvelous thing!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They marveled that a warner has come to them from among them. The disbelievers say, “This is something strange.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, and the disbelievers say, "This is an amazing thing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [50:2] Nay, but they consider it odd that there should have come to them a warner from among themselves, a messenger who is one of them, to threaten them with [the punishment of] the Fire after resurrection. So the disbelievers say, ‘This, warning, is an odd thing!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nay, but they marvel) i.e. the Quraysh; and it is because they marvelled that Allah made this oath: they marvelled when they were told they will be resurrected after death; He said: in fact the Quraysh, among whom Ubayy and Umayyah the sons of Khalaf, Munbih and Nabih the son of Hajjaj, marvelled (that a warner) a warning messenger (of their own) from their own lineage (hath come unto them; and the disbelievers) the disbelievers of Mecca: Ubayy, Umayyah, Munbih and Nabih (say: This) which Muhammad (pbuh) says, i.e. that they will be resurrected after death, (is a strange thing) for he says: 604
